name: Tap Racer
description:
Summary:
Drive on race tracks around the world in this mobile-optimized Racing Game, playable in any browser. Beyond racing, the game features rogue-lite elements, unlockables, and car tuning.

Tap the arrow buttons to switch lanes, avoid obstacles and find the fastest route. Use the money you win to tune your car in the garage. If you succeed you will unlock new cars and hard difficulty.

Each track has a unique surface composition, which can be: asphalt, sand, or dirt. Plan your strategy and optimize your car in the garage. Money is tight, so choosing car upgrades that suit your driving style is important to winning!

Controls:
– Tap arrow buttons to switch lanes
– Car drives automatically

Features:
– Rogue-Lite elements
– Tune your car in the garage
– Earn dollars for winning races
– Unlock new cars and hard difficulty
